title: SPI Wadsworth Center for Senior Health
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. Natalie A Kayani, MD - Wadsworth, OH - Geriatric Medicine
cleaned_text: Loading Complete Locations SPI Wadsworth Center for Senior Health 195 Wadsworth Road Wadsworth, OH 44281 234-312-2329 SPI Summit County Geriatricians 75 Arch Street, Suite G2 Akron, OH 44304 234-312-2329 SPI Green Center for Senior Health 1835 Franks Parkway Uniontown, OH 44685 330-375-4097 About Natalie A Kayani As part of the Summa Health Senior Health Institute, Natalie Kayani, M.D., has a special interest in Dementia. She graduated from the University of Illinois College of Medicine, completed a residency at Vanderbilt University Medical Center in internal medicine and received fellowship training at the Cleveland Clinic Foundation in geriatrics. Dr. Kayani is board certified in internal medicine and geriatric medicine.
